text: Eduardo Peña Triviño (born 26 August 1936) is an Ecuadorian politician, lawyer and writer. He was born in Palenque, Ecuador. He was the 40th Vice President of Ecuador from 1995 to 1996.EDUARDO PEÑA, EL NUEVO VICEPRESIDENTE DE ECUADOR He served during the Sixto Durán Ballén presidency. He replaced Alberto Dahik. ==References== ==Other websites== * Columns by Eduardo Peña Triviño at Diario El Universo Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian lawyers Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:Ecuadorian writers
title: Eduardo Peña Triviño
